Path Math module

path_math.diff_absolute_a_b(a, b)

Sums up absolute a and absolute b.

path_math.diff_pos(a, b)

Subtracts two pos element wise. -> relative distance between two nodes

path_math.get_direction(pos)

Returns the direction of a relative position. :param _sphinx_paramlinks_path_math.get_direction.pos: Relative position

path_math.get_length_same_axis(a, b)

return length and of a and b if row xor column are the same

path_math.get_rel_dist_same_axis(a, b)

return relative distance of a to b if row xor column are the same

path_math.manhattan_distance(a, b)

Calculates the distance between to nodes in horizontal/vertical steps required. :param _sphinx_paramlinks_path_math.manhattan_distance.a: Position of a node. :param _sphinx_paramlinks_path_math.manhattan_distance.b: Position of another node.

path_math.random() → x in the interval [0, 1).
path_math.sum_abs_pos(a, b)

Sums up two absolute pos element wise.

path_math.sum_absolute_a_b(a, b)

Sums up absolute a and absolute b.

path_math.sum_pos(a, b)

Sums up two pos element wise.
